title: November 2: Debate Night
description: Test the candidate’s ability to perform under maximum campaign pressure in a high-stakes public debate.

tasks.prompt: Deliver an opening statement (typed or spoken). Participate in the AI-moderated debate and respond to all 20–25 policy questions, adapting to fact-checks and audience reactions.

narrator: This debate is the centerpiece of your campaign. Maintain composure, credibility, and persuasive clarity while answering rapid-fire policy questions. Audience reactions and AI fact-checks will provide feedback.
readingSummary: Candidates face 20–25 policy questions on economy, foreign policy, social issues, and local concerns.
AI moderator and opponent simulate high-pressure questioning, fact-checks, and audience responses.

tasksDetails.prompt: Deliver an opening statement and answer all debate questions, adjusting responses to feedback and audience reactions.

sources: General Election November 2 – Debate Night Scenario

outcome.description: Debate performance heavily influences final voter approval, CC, and campaign momentum. Demonstrates composure, consistency, and credibility under maximum scrutiny.
